Title: Requires alternating high and low, two-toned signal devices on emergency services vehicles
Summary: Requires alternating high and low, two-toned signal devices on emergency services vehicles in New York city.
LawCode: Amd ยง24-241, NYC Ad Cd
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to requiring alternating high and low, two-toned signal devices on emergency services vehicles
